name: Pastel Earth (Working Title)
description:
Pastel Earth (Working Title)

This is merely a prototype for a project I'm working on.

Controls

WASDBasic move-ingSPACEBARJump-ing (Hold to jump-ing higher)RReload the scene-ingESCPause-ingMOUSEMove cameraMOUSE RIGHT CLICKDash in a fashionably terrible way

The focus of this demo are the visuals, I'm not a programmer. Since I don't have many friends that could just come over during quarantine to play my shitty prototype I'm putting it out there instead. 

It's one level, collision is wank, the options don't work and the animations are either missing or look a bit ass, but I can use any and all feedback I get!

Have (very short) fun!
